related_questions.question:
A fish live on the....
Tolong bantu jawab​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

water

sea

ocean

dead sea

lakes

Penjelasan:

intinya ikan hidup di dalam air brother

a fish lives on the…
artinya: “ikan hidup di…”

ikan hidup dimana? laut/danau/sungai/delta/kolam/muara

karena banyak banget kita pilih yang paling umum aja ya, laut

laut bahasa inggrisnya sea

jadi jawabanya…

“a fish lives on the sea”

related_questions.question:
6. "Would you mind not closing the window?"    The sentence has the same meaning with :
A. Do not close the window, please.
B. Close the window, please,
C. The window must be closed
D. Don't open the window, please.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Do not close the window, please.

related_questions.question: The sulfur oxides and nitrogen oxides will ... in the air​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

The sulfur oxides and nitrogen oxides will evaporate in the air​

Penjelasan:

Sulfur oksida dan nitrogen oksida akan menguap di udara​ dan akan menimbulkan polusi udara, bahkan hujan asam yang sangat merugikan.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
Ana and Anto . . . smart students.
A. is
B. am
c. are
d. was​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

C. are

Penjelasan:

karena Ana dan Anto adalah 2 orang atau lebih

dari satu karena itu harus menggunakan are

semoga membantu semangat terus!

related_questions.question:
1. FANI : Mom, can I go camping this weekend with my classmates?    MOTHER: You have a mid-term test on Monday.
A. Certainly
C. I'm sorry you can't.
B. Sure
D. It doesn't matter.​
Bantu jawab ya kaka kaka please​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

  1. saw
  2. went
  3. invited
  4. made
  5. bought
  6. didn't
  7. told
  8. gave
  9. took
  10. watch

Penjelasan:

Jadi, past tense itu tenses yang menjelaskan kalimat di masa lampau, verbs dalam soal tinggal dijadiin bentuk past atau V2.

CMIIW ✨
